title.rendered: Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies Strain Photoperiod Seeds

content.rendered:
Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies Strain: Indulge in the Magic

Genetic Lineage: OGKB x Legend Do-Si-Dos

🌰 Flavour Profile: Dive into the rich, nutty taste that defines this exceptional strain. Every inhale is a journey into indulgence.

🌼 Effects: Discover the legendary Peanut Butter Cookies Strain effects, as this potent indica-dominant hybrid offers a head-to-toe experience that soothes your body and elevates your mind. It’s your ticket to relaxation and tranquillity.

⏰ Flowering Time: With a flowering time of 9-10 weeks, the Peanut Butter Cookies Strain yield awaits. This medium-height plant is a generous giver, producing up to 650 g/m² indoors and 800 g/plant outdoors.

🌟 Potency: Embrace the potency of a 25% THC level, ensuring a long-lasting and deeply relaxing effect.

🍯 Terpene Symphony: The terpene profile of Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies is a delightful symphony of flavours. Explore notes of Humulene, Alpha Cedrene, Alpha Terpineol, Borneol, Camphene, Citral, D-Limonene, Eugenol, Fenchol, Linalool, Nerolidol, Orange Terpenes, Phytol, Terpinolene, Alpha Pinene, Beta Caryophyllene, Cadinene, Eugenol, Farnesene, Humulene, Myrcene, and Ocimene, creating an aroma that will leave you craving for more.

🌍 Availability: Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies Feminised cannabis seeds are available worldwide, so you can embark on your unforgettable journey no matter where you are.

📜 Legal Note: Please note that Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies seeds are sold as collectable souvenirs only, in strict accordance with U.K. laws.

🌄 Photoperiod Brilliance: For those seeking the best photoperiod seeds, Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies is an electric choice. It’s the epitome of photoperiod seeds at their finest.

🚚 Free U.K Shipping over £50 With International Options Available

Description:

Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies Strain is a captivating journey into the world of cannabis. Born from the perfect union of OGKB and Legend Do-Si-Dos, this strain promises an unforgettable experience. Immerse yourself in its rich, nutty taste and potent effects, designed to relax and elevate.

Flavour & Aroma Of Peanut Butter Cookies Strain:

Indulge in the sumptuous world of flavour with Peanut Butter Cookies Strain. Inhale the essence of roasted nuts, and let the sweet aroma fill your senses. Every session is a culinary adventure.

Potency & Effects:

Discover the legendary Peanut Butter Cookies Strain effects. With a formidable THC level of 25%, it provides a journey of deep relaxation and tranquillity.

Cultivation Of Peanut Butter Cookies Strain:

Cultivating the Peanut Butter Cookies Strain is a rewarding experience. With a flowering time of 9-10 weeks, it offers generous Peanut Butter Cookies Strain yield. Indoors, you can expect up to 650 g/m², while outdoors may yield a bountiful 800 g/plant.

Part of the Tastebudz Syndicate Feminized Seeds Mix Pack

Legal Note:

In strict accordance with U.K. laws, please note that Tastebudz Peanut Butter Cookies seeds are sold solely as collectable souvenirs.
